_header: A ladys heart for to want pity
_description: A roundel (associated with Charles d’Orléans) — 21 lines

BLHar682.First Lines: A Ladies hert forto want piteHit is to fowle ageyne nature…
BLHar682.Last Lines: …That in so benygne a figureSo bewtevous fayre in eche feture
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel; scribe has missed out “a sin” after “fowle” in line 2.
